sentences.english: Enterotoxias pollution of Shimen was the most serious among four sampling spots.
sentences.chinese: 從採樣點污染狀況來看，腸毒素石門污染最重。

sentences.english: Most laboratory animals are quite insensitive to enterotoxin.
sentences.chinese: 大多數實驗動物對腸毒素極不敏感。

sentences.english: Enterotoxigenic escherichia coil (ETEC) related with diarrhoea of early-weaned piglets.
sentences.chinese: 產腸毒素性大腸桿菌與仔豬腹瀉的致病過程密切相關。

sentences.english: Most laboratory animals are quite insensitive to enterotoxin .
sentences.chinese: 大多數實驗動物對腸毒素極不敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the testing method for heat-liable enterotoxin(LT) of ETEC.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討改進檢測腸毒性大腸菌不耐熱腸毒素的方法。
